attributes.action: We, the people, have no confidence in our democratically elected representatives
attributes.background:
Parliament has voted to extend Article 50.
This is despite 498 MPs voting to trigger it two years ago.
We voted to leave the EU.
We didn't vote for MPs to delay Brexit 
We no longer have confidence in our politicians to represent us.
They are our servants , but act as if they are our masters.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
